content: I am a 25 yr old college student in the bronx, nyc, and I know that I would not be able to live my life the way I do IF you all were not in service. I just want to say a HUGE THANK YOU for everything your doing for us and know that we never take it for granted. I know how much every one of you miss your families, your kids and your everyday lives So May Our Lord Bless You and bring u back to us. Your dedication and courage shall not be forgotten. Love Always, Chavonne R.

content: Thank you! It's citizens like you that makes the duty as a GI really worth it. What do you say guys let keep Chavonne around. He is not A one post wonder. His just a wonder making his first post. Chavonne, please come back often. You can find a lot of new friends here. We wish you the best. Please come back soon. You might want to take time to update your profile. Blessings OAL God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans
